Text: I'll never ever work together with him !
Will you take my materials back from him for me ? Please !
Oh , my God ! I've been cheated !
It's a brick ! I can't believe how stupid I was . Damn it !
There was a guy on the sidewalk.He had three new boxes , Panasonic video camera boxes.He said he had to get rid of them quick .
It smells like an ashtray in here !
What ’ s wrong ? I thought we agreed that you were gonna quit smoking .

Look , there are other ways to quit . You can try the nicotine patch , or nicotine chewing gum . We spend a fortune on cigarettes every month and now laws are cracking down and not allowing smoking in any public place . It ’ s not like you can just light up like before .
Fine ! I want a divorce !
Isn't there anything that sounds fishy ?
Yeah , my head hurts , that ’ s all . I ’ Ve been in physics class all day . It ’ s killer !
What ? She was cheating on me with that ugly guy . Oh , no , I feel like such a loser .
But she lied to me .
For God's sake ! It's too bloody . How can people be so cruel ?
You can't prick the fish to please the sick tastes of some bloody people .
Just an animal ? But it has life too . If you want a tattoo , get one . It's your choice because you want it . But has anyone asked the fish if it wanted one ?
With everything , with everybody , with all this !
The tapping of your pen on your desk . It ’ s driving me crazy .
Fine ! By the way would you mind not slurping your coffee every time you have a cup !
I don ’ t slurp my coffee . And plus , how can you hear it when you ’ re shouting into your phone all the time ?
You ’ Ve got to be kidding me ! You ’ re complaining about me talking on the phone when you go out for a cigarette break ten times a day to shoot the breeze ?

Look , we have a lot of accumulated anger from working in these conditions , and it ’ s probably okay to let off steam once in a while . But , it ’ s probably not a good idea to keep it up I ’ m willing to forgive and forget and if you are .
Fine . Let's call a truce . I'll try to more considerate and to keep the noise down .
It's the new neighbor . I hate her guts .
She made another white crack about my clothes .
Why didn't you tell me you had a girlfriend ?
You can't be serious . How dare you not tell me you were going to marry her ?
Oh , you men ! You're all the same .
That's just wrong ! why don't you just quit ?
it sounds like any job will be better than the one you have now !
That ’ s too much .
Oh , shut up , will you ? It was all your fault.If you'd kept quite this would never have happened .
Oh , so it was my fault , was it ? If I hadn't warned you in time it would have been much worse .
How dare you accuse me of stealing your computer ?
I don ’ t want to .
Certainly not .
Turn on the radio ? What for ?
Listen to some music ? And who ’ ll cook dinner ? Will you ?
To a disco ? Oh , no . You know I hate pop .
Absolutely not ! I refuse to have thirteen people for dinner on Friday !
I can't bear you anymore . I am sick of your drinking . I am divorcing you .
How many chances should I give you ? I've given up on you !
I might just ! Enjoy your stupid game !
How could I feel easy ? I ’ m really pissed .
And let them ruin my life ? Forget it !
I really want to take him over my knee .
Yes , me too . I think I ’ Ve lost some important clients recently because of this train !
Stop it . Teacher doesn't treat me any different than she does everyone else .
Hey , I worked hard on that report and I deserve the grade I got .
You're just jealous because you didn't do as well as you thought you did . Admit it .
If you think that she is not fair with your work then you should talk to her in person instead of stewing over it .
That's absolutely ridiculous !
How could you ? I reminded you just this morning .
I have been looking forward to this performance all month .
I'm tired of you always wearing my clothing !
Aren't you the pot calling the kettle black ? You're wearing my pants right now !
Thanks . Sometimes talking with a friend is a great way to get over something . Do you mind if I vent a little bit ?

Great , because I am really mad at William . I mean , what kind of an idiot wouldn't be able to appreciate a smart , beautiful woman like me ? Anybody who would be friends with that guy has to be really dumb .
Oh right ... present company excluded , of course !
What happened to you last night ? You didn ’ t show up .
How annoying !
Just what I thought !
Because I'm the wrong sex , of course !
Yes , that was probably it ! It isn't fair .
Why should I wear a skirt ? Or a dress ?
Why should I do that ? I'm good at my job ! That's the only important thing !
I'm tired of your cut-and-dried opinions . Who do you think you are !
How dare you speak to me like this .
Why not ?
I've been standing here since half past seven . Where on earth have you been ?
It's really very easy saying you're sorry .
You see , that ’ s what I ’ m talking about , I can ’ t stand your sarcastic jokes anymore
Don ’ t criticize Mario or else I ’ ll start on those fat , drunk friends of yours ; they ’ re no saints .
You ’ re unbearable ; you can walk home , I ’ m leaving .
Why didn't you tell me you had a girlfriend ?
But you should tell me you were in love with her .
You know you didn't .
Yes , but you might have told me before .
You can't be serious . How dare you not tell me you are going to marry her ?
Oh , you men ! You are all the same .
She ’ s your sister.What she asked was only duck soup for you.Why can ’ t you be good to her ?
You ’ re making my blood boil .
I'm about to explode ! You ’ Ve made a mess of this matter .
Sorry isn ’ t good enough ! What can you do to help me ?
Well , obviously , what you ’ re doing is not good enough !
I simply couldn ’ t help giving him the fish-eye when I knew all that .
It is impossible . You cheated on me .
Shut up !
But you have had lily already ? You should have told me about her , but you didn't .
Leave me ! Go away !
I am very grateful for your advice .
It's my pleasure to talk with you .
I don't think you really want to hear about it .
To be honest , it was horrible ! My manager is such a pain in the neck !
Well , he made quite a few mistakes on the monthly report and when his supervisor found them , my manager blamed them on me !
There wasn't really anything that I could do . There's always been a lot of bad blood between my manager and myself . If I had said anything , he would have fired for me for sure .
He treats everyone pretty poorly , but the way he treats me really takes the cake !
I really have no idea . All I know is that the thought of him really curls my hair !
I really like the record you lent me the other day .
I'm glad you like it .
And thank you very much for letting me keep it so long .
Not at all .
I'm most grateful . Everyone in our class enjoyed it .
I'm glad .
Hi , Gary , what happened ? I was waiting for you at the theater . Why didn ’ t you meet me there ?
Don ’ t you know our movie starts at seven ? And we were going to meet at the theater at five to seven . Then it doesn ’ t make sense to meet at the apartment .
Why don ’ t you try to be clearer about your intentions ?
It ’ s okay . I don ’ t want to go now . We ’ Ve already missed ten minutes of the movie . I don ’ t want to see a movie without watching the beginning .
What ’ s wrong ? I want a break from this horrible job .
How could I help but follow it ? The fluctuation of dollar is killing my company ! The exchange rates are eating into our profits , and we can't do anything about it .

It's really frustrating , isn't it ? I have the same problem . I would feel a lot better if the currency was a little more stable . With the way the dollar plummeting lately , my securities have gone up in smoke .
Every day I have less money ! I haven't spent anything , it is just melting away because of the shifts in exchange rate .
Oh , don ’ t talk to me about last night ! It was the most awful evening I ’ Ve ever had .
You can say that again . Susan ’ brother dropped in from out of town , so I offered to put him up for a few days . But he ’ s driving me up a wall . This guy is bottomless pit .
He doesn ’ t lift a finger ! I bend over backwards cleaning up all day and he sleeps in until noon .
That wouldn ’ t be a lie !
But it is ! Take this morning for example . The subway was so packed this morning , I got totally squished by about a hundred busy commuters on the way to work .
I didn't like her butting in where I didn't want her . She's a chatter box .
I know . But I just can't stand her butting in when I was trying to emphasize a point .
It is stupid to say so .
Bang ? ! Bang ! Bang ! What are the Kings doing at seven o ’ clock on Sunday morning ?
Finding an excuse is obviously down your alley . And trying to avoid taking care of the children is what you are good at .
You are passing the buck . I'll be hanged if I ask you to go to the park with us .
Ah ! No ! Damn it !
So what ? I just lost one hour's worth of work .
Yes , that's true . Damn ! I just lost half my paper , and now I can't even do my homework.This is a bad time for this to happen .
His name is not fat boy ! You can be so rude sometimes .
Stop running around in front of the TV , will you ? Why don ’ t you just sit and watch ?
Then stay away . Nobody's keeping you from doing that .
I am fed up with Jack . He is so weak in dealing with other people and always eats dirt .
How do you know that I didn ’ t try ? I just couldn ’ t manage it .
You won ’ t believe who ’ s been elected to do overtime on the Baker account ! Me ! I ’ Ve already logged in 20 hours of overtime !
Wow ! Why so much ? I thought they were getting you an assistant .
They were supposed to , but so far nobody ’ s turned up , and I ’ m left on my own to do the work . This is the first break I ’ Ve had all day .
They ’ re really running you into the ground . Why don ’ t you ask for some time off ? You could take a long weekend and go away somewhere .
You won ’ t believe who ’ s been elected to do overtime on the Baker account ! Me ! I ’ Ve already logged in 20 hours of overtime !
Wow ! Why so much ? I thought they were getting you an assistant .
They were supposed to , but so far nobody ’ s turned up , and I ’ m left on my own to do the work . This is the first break I ’ Ve had all day .
They ’ re really running you into the ground . Why don ’ t you ask for some time off ? You could take a long weekend and go away somewhere .
You won ’ t believe who ’ s been elected to do overtime on the Baker account ! Me ! I ’ Ve already logged in 20 hours of overtime !
Wow ! Why so much ? I thought they were getting you an assistant .
They were supposed to , but so far nobody ’ s turned up , and I ’ m left on my own to do the work . This is the first break I ’ Ve had all day .
They ’ re really running you into the ground . Why don ’ t you ask for some time off ? You could take a long weekend and go away somewhere .
I ’ Ve had it ! I ’ m done working for a company that is taking me nowhere !
That ’ s exactly what I am going to do ! I ’ Ve decided to create my own company ! I ’ m going to write up a business plan , get some investors and start working for myself !
Well , no.it can ’ t be that hard ! I mean , all you have to do is explain your business , how you are going to do things and that ’ s it , right ?
So who does he think he is , anyway , I can't believe the way that my boss has been ordering everyone around lately , I mean , it's now like he is the CEO , or anything .

Yikes ! you are joking , right ? I can't believe it . No wonder he is so stressed and bossy lately . I thought he was just being ostentatious by giving orders to people and all the different departments . What big shoes to fill !
What does a CEO do anyway ? I know the CEO makes the most money in the company , but what does he actually do ?
Flight BE407 to Rome is delayed . Will passengers please wait in the lounge .
It ’ s infuriating . I have to be in Rome by five .
Bob , I'm really upset with you .
You forgot it last year as well .
I believe that was a wedding present to both of us , Joanne . And you hardly ever use it !
He ’ s my grandfather , and he never really liked you anyway !
Then , why didn't you try to prevent it in the beginning ?
I don't want to argue anymore . Please get out of my life !
No way ! Please don't follow me around .
You didn't show up to my performance last night ! Some kind of friend you are !
Sure . You look like you're all black and blue .
I'm not at all convinced . Tomorrow is Saturday !
Don ’ t ever mention him . I ’ m getting over it .
Are you done ?
I'm so angry at Bob for buying a new bike .
You didn't ring me last night.You said you would .
That's all right . But why were you so rude to me at lunch .
And why are you yarning now ? Are you bored ?
Oh , my God ! I've been cheated !
It's a brick ! I can't believe how stupid I was . Damn it !
Don't brother me !
Did Bean send these dirty jokes to you , too ? Look !
No wonder he asked for my address first-he just wants to harass me !
you said it . Good beer , good music , and on top of that , there are so many hot girls here !
No , but now he'll be in trouble . What's a boyfriend for ? To forget about Valentine's Day ?
You know , it's OK for a girl to forget these " big days " , but for a guy , to do that is unforgivable .
The heating controls don't work anymore , so it always feels like it's about 100 degrees in the car — even in the summer !
It costs more than you think to run a car---especially when there are so many things wrong with it !
He's a sad dog . He came to the wedding in jeans !
Ur , you really let me down .
No , you haven ’ t . You just don ’ t care about me . You ’ re an indifferent husband .
Ur , you really let me down .
No , you haven ’ t . You just don ’ t care about me . You ’ re an indifferent husband .
How could I feel easy ? I ’ m really pissed .
Fine ! I ’ ll start drinking and having home cooked meals that are low in fat . Are you happy now ?
Finding an excuse is obviously down your alley . And trying to avoid taking care of the children is what you are good at .
You are passing the buck . I'll be hanged if I ask you to go to the park with us .
When I quarrel with my husband . He didn't even try to cool me out .
I know I'm a blabbermouth , but what do you think she should do , John ?
I know ! But it's really important to her ! Her whole life could be ruined by this man !
For crying out loud ... How fast are we losing money ?
We ’ re doomed !
Peter ! Pack them . Don't read them .
Where have you been , Alice , you're over an hour late .
why ere you getting off work so late ? The office close at six , doesn ’ t it ?
Didn ’ t you tell him you have an appointment ?
to be honest , I'm a bit fed up .
well , my boyfriend was supposed to call me last night , but he never did .
the thing is , this isn't the first time he's promised to do something and then didn't .
a bit ? I'm extremely annoyed that he didn't phone me when he promised me that he would ! He's such a liar .
Stay away from me .
I'm serious , Zina . Back off . I have a bottle of pepper spray in my pocket .
Why are you being so nice to me ? Don't think for a second that I trust you .
I don't know what to do about the people who live in the flat above me !
They're incredibly selfish . They ' re always up until the wee hours of the night playing their music so loudly that I have to wear earplugs in order to fall asleep !
I tried to introduce myself to them when they moved in , but they were so arrogant that I didin't want to ever talk to them again !
They both just talk about how great they are all the time .
They soud like the neighbours from hell !
They are ! Besides being loud and arrogant , they're also terrible gossips . They're always talking about everybody else in the apartment .
Really , Mary , you ’ re horrible .
Why don ’ t you marry Rose , then ?
We'll see how much fun it is after they take all your money ! !
You are so paranoid ! Not everybody is a crook , you know .
It's taking you forever to do my hair .
You should've been done already .
I don't think that you're done .
My hair looks hideous .
It doesn't look good at all .
I really hope that you didn't expect me to pay you for this .
Excuse me ! I don't have time to waste . I've been here almost one full hour !
Oh , gosh ! I have to go to the restroom so bad ! I can't bear it anymore !
What are we going to do ? I can't get the car out of this ditch . I'm stuck !
I know . This is terrible . What can we do ? This snow doesn't stop falling !
Look at what you have done . All thumbs .
Waiter !
I've never been to such a dirty restaurant , and never seen such slow service .
Well , I ’ d better get back to work . I ’ Ve got a ton of stuff on my desk !
What do you mean ? My daddy gave me this car for my birthday last month . It ’ s brand new !
my boss has been breathing down my neck all day . I can't wait for the weekend !
you can say that again ! He won't even let us check our personal email at work !
Didn ’ t I tell you ? It ’ s over !
It was a few things . The first thing that happened was that we were supposed to go out for a romantic dinner for our one year anniversary , but she stood me up !
No , but I ended up finding out later that night when I saw her with another man at a club near my home !
I wanted to , but I knew that if I spoke to her , I'd just blow up at her , so I decided to just go home . I called her later that night , but she didn't answer the phone .
I can ’ t believe she would do that to you . It ’ s so dishonest---and rude !
I know . I still haven ’ t heard from her . The good thing is that I ’ m so angry with her that I don ’ t feel sad about not having her around .

You just can ’ t imagine ! I waited for the first bus but it was too full , so I waited for the second , and it was still very crowded . Then I decided not to wait for the next one , and got on the second bus . It was so full that I had to stand on one foot ! No kidding !
Just get out of my face !
Leave me alone !
What a terrible house !
The door bell doesn't work , the sink is leaking , there's no hot water , and the building is falling apart !
I know I ’ m going to bite the dust going down this hill . I almost got killed on the chair lift ! This is going to be so embarrassing .
No ! ! !
Easy ? Ha ! ! It was easy for them to cheat you ! !
I'm tired of your cut-and-dried opinions . Who do you think you are !
Why not ?
The cat has eaten my fish , I'll kill it .
I'll beat him .
I ’ m itching for moving !
It ’ s so wet and dark , I ’ m just fed up .
This is the end , Jane . I don't want a girlfriend who goes out with other guys all the time .
No way . I've given you too many chances already .
Don't brother me !
How could you ? I reminded you just this morning .
You can ’ t take me to jail ! What about my sleigh ? It ’ s Christmas Eve ! I have presents to deliver ! Rudolph ! Prancer ! Dancer ! Get help !
Fine ! By the way would you mind not slurping your coffee every time you have a cup !
You ’ Ve got to be kidding me ! You ’ re complaining about me talking on the phone when you go out for a cigarette break ten times a day to shoot the breeze ?
I simply can't bear your barbaric behavior .
You should feel shameful for your behavior .
Didn't I tell you ? It's over !
It was a few things . The first thing that happened was that we were supposed to go out for a romantic dinner for our one year anniversary , but she stood me up !
No , but I ended up finding out later that night when I saw her drinking with another man at a club near my home !
I wanted to , but I knew that if I spoke to her , I'd just blow up at her , so I decided to just go home . I called her later that the night , but she didn't answer the phone .
I know . I still haven't heard from her . The good thing is that I'm so angry with her that I don't feel sad about not having her around .
What ’ s wrong with that ? Cigarette is the thing I go crazy for .
Crazy is too kind . Insane is more like it . Nuts ! Wacko ! Psycho !
What ’ s the problem ? Things are getting out of hand . You keep sticking your nose where it doesn ’ t belong .
what a bummer ! You set me up ?
how dare you !
They promised us a sea view .
Isn't it awful ? I can't bear to look at it . I don't think I can stand this place for two weeks .
It's terrible how things have changed.You remember there used to be trees on all these hills .

No way ! They want publicity for themselves , so that they get invited to make more films , go to lots of cocktail parties , and even make albums ! They have such an easy life . They don ’ t even pay for Drin
I don ’ t understand how you can have any sympathy for show biz stars . They ’ re overpaid , over-ambitious , and over-adored .
Come on ! They only do that to get even more publicity for their films and themselves .
Shut up . You should think how to make fortunes , not look for a squabble .
No , I just check my weight , I'm getting fatter .
You're spending a very long time on my hair .
Are you sure you're finished ?
You did a horrible job on my hair .
Emily , what kind of report is this ?
Don't get smart with me . Here , do it again , but do it right this time .
This ref needs glasses . Hey ref , open your eyes ! I can ’ t believe he didn ’ t see that !
Look what you've done !
Yes , and hurry up !
Yes , and please be more careful in the future !
I really don't know how to break this to you , but it ’ s eating me alive !
But where have you been , Alice ? You're over an hour late .
But why were you getting off work so late ? The office close at six , doesn't it ?
But didn't you tell him you had an appointment ?
No , you must stay ! I swear it , and the oath shall be kept .
I tell you I must go !
I ask you to pass through life at my side-to be my second self and best earthly companion .
I'll never again come to your side ; I am turn away now and can't return .
Quiet everybody !
My son has really taken it out of me . He never keeps out of mischief .
Yeah . Anyway he is driving me mad .
Come on , Liz . Be open-minded ! Look at my eyes , they are puffy . And my eye bags , they are dark and loose and full of lines and circles . I really hope surgery can wipe out the tired feelings .
I have to work on Saturday all day ! I really hate my job !
You shouldn't have told her the truth.What can we do now ?
You are always like this . I've told you many times not to tell her .
It's too late to say sorry now.Oh , what am I going to do ?
That's horrible . Was that the first time you'd shown up late to work ?
Oh , my God ! I've been cheated !
It's a brick ! I can't believe how stupid I was . Damn it !

Stephanie ! Did you just get to school ? But you were up and about when I left the dorm this morning ! That was about an hour and a half ago . This happens all the time ! Why do you always take so long

Please explain because it makes no sense to me . How can a girl ’ s routine be so complicated ? You get up , you shower , you get dressed , you brush your teeth , you ’ re out the door . Half an hour , tops .
What does that have to do with those men shooting at us ? Most importantly , why did you lie to me !
I can ’ t believe this ! Why are all these things happening to me ! I can ’ t take it anymore ! Let me out of the car !
I see . That ’ s convenient ! I never understood things like this , such as GMT . I never know what time zone we are in or when to change my clock !

That ’ s why it was so weird traveling from Beijing to LA ! Because of the huge time difference , even though we left Beijing at noon and flew for more than eight hours , we still arrived in LA the same day at noon ! It ’ s like we went back in time !
That's all right . But why were you so rude to me at lunch .
And why are you yarning now ? Are you bored ?
addiction ? checking emails and text messages often can be called an addiction ? no way !
Yes , but I bet $ 200 dollars on the Cougars !
I can ’ t believe it ! I thought the Cougars were going to win for sure .
20 to 1 , in favour of the Cougars !
I won't be paying you for this .
You don ’ t love me , Roy .

No , you used to be . But not now . You are in love with someone else . You are in love with my friend , Janet . You appreciate her very much . You think she is beautiful and fun to be with and you think I ’ m dumb and uninteresting .
I envy her and also I hate her at the same time .
Oh , shut up , Roy .
Oh , SHUT UP !
Joan is a thorough drag !
Anthony , you were caught making international calls from the office phone , you called in sick in eight times this month and you smell like alcohol !
But it was her that makes us so embarrassed .
I don't care .
I wish I knew who had moved our flower pots .
What did you think you were doing ?
How dare you be so inconsiderate ? That's wrong .
You didn't tell me she was married !
I got carried away . I made such a fool of myself . They were both laughing at me !
The cat has eaten my fish , I'll kill it .
Hey . Why did you take that money ? You are such a cheater ! I should send you to jail !
I am not cheating . When you pass go , you collect $ 200 , Everyone knows that !
Just get out of my face , would you ?
Jennifer Davies ? Give me a break ! I can't stand her . She's such a dweeb ! How could she possibly ace it when she keeps cutting class all the time ?
Get out of here !
Oh , gag me ! She's totally gross !
I hate to see the abuse of animals .
It makes me sick .
You !
You told Martha that I was on a date ? What was that all about ?
Don't bother .
My car won ’ t start ! Stupid old car !
Fine , then ! If that ’ s the way you feel , so be it . But you ’ re losing out on a great opportunity here . I ’ m going to go hit up Mum for the cash .
I have a bone to pick with you .
You always have a chip on your shoulder .
I can't stand the stupid guy any longer.It ' s unbelievable !
He does everything so mindlessly that he is going to drive me crazy .
I have told him how to do it several times , but he's never listened to me .
We ’ re in the same boat ! I ’ Ve eaten fast food the whole week . I hate it now .
How could you have done that without asking me first ?
It smells like an ashtray in here !
What ’ s wrong ? I thought we agreed that you were gonna quit smoking .

Look , there are other ways to quit . You can try the nicotine patch , or nicotine chewing gum . We spend a fortune on cigarettes every month and now laws are cracking down and not allowing smoking in any public place . It ’ s not like you can just light up like before .
Fine ! I want a divorce !

Why didn ’ t you just answer my question directly ? Why would Chinese answer questions this way ? I simply asked if you did it or not . It ’ s a very simple question . And Chinese often give the reason before they would give a direct answer .
Yeah , after all the explanations like , it ’ s too heavy , I was in a hurry ... whatever .
Why didn't you tell me you had a girlfriend ?
But you should have told me you were in love with her .
You know you didn't .
Yes , but you might have told me before .
You can't be serious . How dare you not tell me you were going to marry her ?
Oh , you men ! You're all the same .
Absolutely not ! I'm not a thief .
Did you hear what she said to me ?
What do you think I should do about it ?
I'm really fed up with Larry ! He's the biggest airhead I've ever met.He always makes careless mistakes , and he's a pain to work with .

You only say that because you don't have to work with him.The people in your department seem so capable and nice to be around.Take Mary for example.She ' s smart and enthusiastic . I've never met anyone as cheery as she is .
Wait , what are you doing ! You can ’ t just kiss me then go for second base !
I'm so angry . I feel like killing someone .
I wish I knew who had moved our flower pots .
What did you think you were doing ?
How dare you be so inconsiderate ? That's wrong .
I believe that was a wedding present to both of us , Joanne . And you hardly ever use it !
He ’ s my grandfather , and he never really liked you anyway !
Just get out of my face !
Leave me alone !
Congratulations on the new house !
Thanks ! We love it .
Well , you guys worked hard for it . It's really beautiful .
I'll never get over it . Oh , Harry , it was all so unnecessary . That man ! ! How could he do this to us after we'd put him up ?
And his story didn't even hold together . I feel such an idiot .
Well , I can ’ t believe your uncle and aunt came to stay with us for a week , and they did not even call us in advance .
I know , but it is hard for me to get used to your relatives coming to visit us , and without warning .
But how guilty to waste food !
Why ? It's in mint condition !
I've created a monster ... you're a better bayer than me !
Mom ! I'll wear a helmet and I'll drive sane . I promise .
Do you have any idea what time it is ?
If you do this again , don't even bother coming home .
Well , if I'm not living here anymore , then I won't have to listen to your rules .
You ought to have worked harder then you wouldn ’ t have failed your exams . You have to take a job and study .
Who knows ! That might come to later .
I can't stand riding the bus .
Me too , it's so unreliable .
It's also horrible having to be at a bus stop in any kind of weather .
Exactly.That ' s the worst part .
The new computer software is driving me crazy ! I really need a break !

Yeah , his attitude is great , but he ’ s really unreliable . Sometimes he ’ s really productive , but then other times ... take last Tuesday for instance , he was forty-five minutes late for our morning meeting !

But I don ’ t like them.It ’ s not fair .
You can ’ t take me to jail ! What about my sleigh ? It ’ s Christmas Eve ! I have presents to deliver ! Rudolph ! Prancer ! Dancer ! Get help !
Oh , shut up about ties ! Forget about ties , why not ?
What a mess , Jack !
I have a headache . These past few days I've been living off painkillers . Man , I feel like my head is going to explode .
You said you were only going to window shop !
